verses.verse: And the LORD <WH3068> spake <WH1696> unto Moses <WH4872> and to Aaron <WH175>, saying <WH559> unto them,

Speak <WH1696> unto the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>, saying <WH559>, These <WH2063> are the beasts <WH2416> which ye shall eat <WH398> among all the beasts <WH929> that are on the earth <WH776>.
Whatsoever parteth <WH6536> the hoof <WH6541>, and is clovenfooted <WH8156> <WH8157>, and cheweth <WH5927> the cud <WH1625>, among the beasts <WH929>, that shall ye eat <WH398>.

Nevertheless <WH389> these shall ye not eat <WH398> of them that chew <WH5927> the cud <WH1625>, or of them that divide <WH6536> the hoof <WH6541>: as the camel <WH1581>, because he cheweth <WH5927> the cud <WH1625>, but divideth <WH6536> not the hoof <WH6541>; he is unclean <WH2931> unto you.
And the coney <WH8227>, because he cheweth <WH5927> the cud <WH1625>, but divideth <WH6536> not the hoof <WH6541>; he is unclean <WH2931> unto you.
And the hare <WH768>, because he cheweth <WH5927> the cud <WH1625>, but divideth <WH6536> not the hoof <WH6541>; he is unclean <WH2931> unto you.
And the swine <WH2386>, though he divide <WH6536> the hoof <WH6541>, and be clovenfooted <WH8156> <WH8157>, yet he cheweth <WH1641> not the cud <WH1625>; he is unclean <WH2931> to you.
Of their flesh <WH1320> shall ye not eat <WH398>, and their carcase <WH5038> shall ye not touch <WH5060>; they are unclean <WH2931> to you.

¶ These shall ye eat <WH398> of all that are in the waters <WH4325>: whatsoever hath fins <WH5579> and scales <WH7193> in the waters <WH4325>, in the seas <WH3220>, and in the rivers <WH5158>, them shall ye eat <WH398>.

And all that have not fins <WH5579> and scales <WH7193> in the seas <WH3220>, and in the rivers <WH5158>, of all that move <WH8318> in the waters <WH4325>, and of any living <WH2416> thing <WH5315> which is in the waters <WH4325>, they shall be an abomination <WH8263> unto you:
They shall be even an abomination <WH8263> unto you; ye shall not eat <WH398> of their flesh <WH1320>, but ye shall have their carcases <WH5038> in abomination <WH8262>.
Whatsoever hath no fins <WH5579> nor scales <WH7193> in the waters <WH4325>, that shall be an abomination <WH8263> unto you.

¶ And these are they which ye shall have in abomination <WH8262> among <WH4480> the fowls <WH5775>; they shall not be eaten <WH398>, they are an abomination <WH8263>: the eagle <WH5404>, and the ossifrage <WH6538>, and the ospray <WH5822>,
And the vulture <WH1676>, and the kite <WH344> after his kind <WH4327>;
Every raven <WH6158> after his kind <WH4327>;
And the owl <WH1323> <WH3284>, and the night hawk <WH8464>, and the cuckow <WH7828>, and the hawk <WH5322> after his kind <WH4327>,
And the little owl <WH3563>, and the cormorant <WH7994>, and the great owl <WH3244>,
And the swan <WH8580>, and the pelican <WH6893>, and the gier eagle <WH7360>,
And the stork <WH2624>, the heron <WH601> after her kind <WH4327>, and the lapwing <WH1744>, and the bat <WH5847>.
All fowls <WH5775> that creep <WH8318>, going <WH1980> upon all four <WH702>, shall be an abomination <WH8263> unto you.

Yet these may ye eat <WH398> of every flying <WH5775> creeping <WH8318> thing that goeth <WH1980> upon all four <WH702>, which have legs <WH3767> above <WH4605> their feet <WH7272>, to leap <WH5425> withal <WH2004> upon the earth <WH776>;

Even these of them ye may eat <WH398>; the locust <WH697> after his kind <WH4327>, and the bald locust <WH5556> after his kind <WH4327>, and the beetle <WH2728> after his kind <WH4327>, and the grasshopper <WH2284> after his kind <WH4327>.
But all other flying <WH5775> creeping things <WH8318>, which have four <WH702> feet <WH7272>, shall be an abomination <WH8263> unto you.
And for these ye shall be unclean <WH2930>: whosoever toucheth <WH5060> the carcase <WH5038> of them shall be unclean <WH2930> until the even <WH6153>.
And whosoever beareth <WH5375> ought of the carcase <WH5038> of them shall wash <WH3526> his clothes <WH899>, and be unclean <WH2930> until the even <WH6153>.

The carcases of every beast <WH929> which divideth <WH6536> the hoof <WH6541>, and is not clovenfooted <WH8157> <WH8156>, nor cheweth <WH5927> the cud <WH1625>, are unclean <WH2931> unto you: every one that toucheth <WH5060> them shall be unclean <WH2930>.

And whatsoever <WH3605> <WH1992> goeth <WH1980> upon his paws <WH3709>, among all manner of beasts <WH2416> that go <WH1980> on all four <WH702>, those are unclean <WH2931> unto you: whoso toucheth <WH5060> their carcase <WH5038> shall be unclean <WH2930> until the even <WH6153>.
And he that beareth <WH5375> the carcase <WH5038> of them shall wash <WH3526> his clothes <WH899>, and be unclean <WH2930> until the even <WH6153>: they are unclean <WH2931> unto you.

¶ These also shall be unclean <WH2931> unto you among the creeping things <WH8318> that creep <WH8317> upon the earth <WH776>; the weasel <WH2467>, and the mouse <WH5909>, and the tortoise <WH6632> after his kind <WH4327>,
And the ferret <WH604>, and the chameleon <WH3581>, and the lizard <WH3911>, and the snail <WH2546>, and the mole <WH8580>.
These are unclean <WH2931> to you among all that creep <WH8318>: whosoever doth touch <WH5060> them, when they be dead <WH4194>, shall be unclean <WH2930> until the even <WH6153>.

And upon whatsoever any of them, when they are dead <WH4194>, doth fall <WH5307>, it shall be unclean <WH2930>; whether it be any vessel <WH3627> of wood <WH6086>, or raiment <WH899>, or skin <WH5785>, or sack <WH8242>, whatsoever vessel <WH3627> it be, wherein any work <WH4399> is done <WH6213>, it must be put <WH935> into water <WH4325>, and it shall be unclean <WH2930> until the even <WH6153>; so it shall be cleansed <WH2891>.
And every earthen <WH2789> vessel <WH3627>, whereinto any of them falleth <WH5307> <WH8432>, whatsoever is in it shall be unclean <WH2930>; and ye shall break <WH7665> it.

Of all meat <WH400> which may be eaten <WH398>, that on which such water <WH4325> cometh <WH935> shall be unclean <WH2930>: and all drink <WH4945> that may be drunk <WH8354> in every such vessel <WH3627> shall be unclean <WH2930>.

And every thing whereupon any part of their carcase <WH5038> falleth <WH5307> shall be unclean <WH2930>; whether it be oven <WH8574>, or ranges <WH3600> for pots, they shall be broken down <WH5422>: for they are unclean <WH2931>, and shall be unclean <WH2931> unto you.

Nevertheless a fountain <WH4599> or pit <WH953>, wherein there is plenty <WH4723> of water <WH4325>, shall be clean <WH2889>: but that which toucheth <WH5060> their carcase <WH5038> shall be unclean <WH2930>.
And if any part of their carcase <WH5038> fall <WH5307> upon any sowing <WH2221> seed <WH2233> which is to be sown <WH2232>, it shall be clean <WH2889>.
But if any water <WH4325> be put <WH5414> upon the seed <WH2233>, and any part of their carcase <WH5038> fall <WH5307> thereon, it shall be unclean <WH2931> unto you.
And if any beast <WH929>, of which ye may eat <WH402>, die <WH4191>; he that toucheth <WH5060> the carcase <WH5038> thereof shall be unclean <WH2930> until the even <WH6153>.

And he that eateth <WH398> of the carcase <WH5038> of it shall wash <WH3526> his clothes <WH899>, and be unclean <WH2930> until the even <WH6153>: he also that beareth <WH5375> the carcase <WH5038> of it shall wash <WH3526> his clothes <WH899>, and be unclean <WH2930> until the even <WH6153>.
And every creeping thing <WH8318> that creepeth <WH8317> upon the earth <WH776> shall be an abomination <WH8263>; it shall not be eaten <WH398>.

Whatsoever goeth <WH1980> upon the belly <WH1512>, and whatsoever goeth <WH1980> upon all four <WH702>, or whatsoever hath more <WH7235> feet <WH7272> among all creeping things <WH8318> that creep <WH8317> upon the earth <WH776>, them ye shall not eat <WH398>; for they are an abomination <WH8263>.

Ye shall not make <WH8262> yourselves <WH5315> abominable <WH8262> with any creeping thing <WH8318> that creepeth <WH8317>, neither shall ye make yourselves unclean <WH2933> with them, that ye should be defiled <WH2930> thereby.

For I am the LORD <WH3068> your God <WH430>: ye shall therefore sanctify yourselves <WH6942>, and ye shall be holy <WH6918>; for I am holy <WH6918>: neither shall ye defile <WH2930> yourselves <WH5315> with any manner of creeping thing <WH8318> that creepeth <WH7430> upon the earth <WH776>.
For I am the LORD <WH3068> that bringeth <WH5927> you up out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, to be your God <WH430>: ye shall therefore be holy <WH6918>, for I am holy <WH6918>.

This is the law <WH8451> of the beasts <WH929>, and of the fowl <WH5775>, and of every living <WH2416> creature <WH5315> that moveth <WH7430> in the waters <WH4325>, and of every creature <WH5315> that creepeth <WH8317> upon the earth <WH776>:
To make a difference <WH914> between the unclean <WH2931> and the clean <WH2889>, and between the beast <WH2416> that may be eaten <WH398> and the beast <WH2416> that may not be eaten <WH398>.
